markdownRemark.html:

I donâ€™t dig into this yet, but realized that itâ€™s not shown if an internal link to the other post in markdown like this exists anywhere in my whole posts:

[this](/started-my-blog/)

So, this is the post only for solving the problem! Anyway, the error disappeared because I wrote the line above ðŸ˜‚
